Phase 1 - Consented study participant attend screen visit provide fast blood urine sample . Those individual vitamin D insufficient base serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration invite participate Phase II Phase II - double-blind , randomize , control study design examine vitamin D status vitamin D insufficient individual consume water-soluble form vitamin D3 . Eligible participant ask consume one three beverage : ) rooibos iced-tea ( control ) ; ii ) rooibos iced-tea fortified 1000 IU water-soluble vitamin D3 ; iii ) rooibos iced-tea fortified 1000 IU water-soluble vitamin D3 360 mg calcium 240 mL iced-tea consume daily 6 week . Participants attend 6 weekly visit follow baseline provide fast blood sample assessment serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration . Objectives : 1 ) To investigate plasma/serum urine vitamin D metabolite profile vitamin D sufficient insufficient individual ; 2 ) To determine effect vitamin D3 fortification serum 25-dihydroxy-vitamin D [ 25 ( OH ) D ] concentration , marker vitamin D calcium metabolism , vitamin D metabolite profile plasma/serum urine vitamin D insufficient individual .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Vitamin D Fortification Vitamin D Metabolite Profiles Status Vitamin D Insufficient Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: Health individual general public recruit cross-sectional study design compare plasma/serum urine vitamin D metabolite profile identify vitamin D sufficient insufficient individual . There two objective : Objective 1 : To investigate plasma/serum urine vitamin D metabolite profile vitamin D sufficient insufficient individual ; N=20 consist 10 individual identify vitamin D insufficient 10 individual identify vitamin D deficient individual . Objective 2 : To determine effect vitamin D3 fortification serum 25-dihydroxy-vitamin D [ 25 ( OH ) D ] concentration , marker vitamin D calcium metabolism , vitamin D metabolite profile plasma/serum urine vitamin D insufficient individual . N=45 . To achieve objective , study conduct two phase : Phase 1 - Healthy male female , ≥19 ≤50 year age , recruit general public . Consented study participant provide fast blood urine sample purpose determination vitamin D status ( insufficient vs. deficient ) base serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration . Forty-five ( 45 ) individual identify vitamin D insufficient ( serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration ≥30 ≤75 nmol/L ) proceed phase II . A N=20 ( 10 vitamin D insufficient 10 vitamin D deficient ) also identify satisfy objective 1 . Phase II - double-blind , randomize , control study design examine vitamin D status vitamin D insufficient individual consume water-soluble form vitamin D3 . Eligible participant randomize consume one three beverage : ) rooibos iced-tea ( control ) ; ii ) rooibos iced-tea fortified 1000 IU water-soluble vitamin D3 ; iii ) rooibos iced-tea fortified 1000 IU water-soluble vitamin D3 360 mg calcium 240 mL iced-tea consume daily 6 week . Both researcher participant blind beverage group assign participant . Participants attend 6 weekly visit follow baseline visit provide fast blood sample assessment serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration . Analysis intact-PTH , alkaline-phosphatase , calcium , phosphorus , CRP , TAP vitamin D metabolite profile urine sample also obtain assessment N-telopeptide vitamin D metabolite profile also occur Baseline Week 6 . Fasting blood sample collect week 3 use additional assessment serum alkaline phosphatase , calcium phosphorus . A 3-day Food Record provide week 3 . Vitamin D insufficient participant stratify accord serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration ( ≥30 ≤50 , > 50 ≤75 nmol/L ) screen prior beverage study ensure range lower high serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration represent beverage group .
DOC.criteria: A . Inclusion Criteria Objective 1 ( Part One ) : 1 . Adult volunteer , male female , 19 50 year age ; 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥20 ≤30 kg/m2 ( normal overweight ) ; 3 . Must stable regime past three month , take vitamin mineral/dietary/herbal supplement ; 4 . Willing provide inform consent . B . Inclusion Criteria Objective 2 ( Part Two ) : 1 . Adult volunteer , male female , 19 50 year age ; 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥20 ≤30 kg/m2 ( normal overweight ) ; 3 . Must stable regime past three month , take vitamin mineral/dietary/herbal supplement ; 4 . Vitamin D insufficient ( serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration ≥30 ≤75 nmol/L ) ; 5 . Willing comply protocol requirement ; 6 . Willing provide inform consent . 1 . Take vitamin D calcium supplement within last three month start date study , study ; 2 . History vitamin D deficiency ( serum 25 ( OH ) D concentration < 30 nmol/L ) ; 3 . History hypocalcaemia ; 4 . Presence clinically diagnose disease affect circulatory , respiratory , immune , skeletal , urinary , muscular , endocrine , digestive , nervous reproductive system require medical treatment ; 5 . Taking medication ( exception birth control ) ; 6 . Daily consumption three serving dairy product ; 7 . Undergone significant sun exposure one month start date study ; 8 . Use use tan booth one month start date study , study ; 9 . Plan travel sunny climate study ; 10 . Currently smoke smoke within last six month start date study , study ; 11 . Have allergy tea product ; 12 . Pregnant lactating ; 13 . Consume excessive alcohol ( > 10 drinks/week woman , > 15 drinks/week men ) .
